{% set employee = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee)%}
Date: {{ doc.date or frappe.utils.today() }}
{{ "doc.serial_no" }}
Employee Name: {{ doc.employee_name }}
Employee ID: {{ employee.employee_number }}
Designation: {{ doc.designation }}
Department: {{ doc.department }}
Appraisal Letter {{ frappe.format_date(frappe.utils.nowdate(),"yyyy") }}

Dear {{ employee.salutation or "Mr/Ms" }} {{ doc.employee_name }},


{% set start_date = frappe.get_doc("Appraisal Cycle",doc.appraisal_cycle).start_date %} The year {{ frappe.format_date(start_date,"yyyy") }} had been eventful and challenging for all of us in {{ doc.company }}. We all had met the huge challenges of scaling up our business and growing our bottom line. In recognition of your performance and contribution to the organization during the performance evaluation year {{ frappe.format_date(start_date,"yyyy") }}, your effective increment would be {{ "${sel_payroll_percentage}" }}%. The break of your increment % is as follows:



Type Performance Hike {{ doc.text2 or "Other Hike" }} Total Increment Effect
%age {{ "${percentage1}" }}% {{ "${percentage2}" }}% {{ "${sel_payroll_percentage}" }}%

Further, the summary of your annual compensation w.e.f. {{frappe.format_date(start_date)}}, for the following fiscal year will be as follows.

Component Annual CTC Monthly CTC Monthly Gross
{{ "As on March 2023"}} {{ "${prev_master_annual_ctc}" }} {{ "${prev_master_mon_ctc}"}} {{ "${prev_master_monthly_ctc}" }}
{{ "Effective from April 2024"}} {{ "${sel_payroll_annual_ctc}" }} {{ "${sel_payroll_mon_ctc}"}} {{ "${sel_payroll_monthly_ctc}" }}

The detailed breakup of your revised CTC will be as per the attached annexure herewith. All the terms and conditions of your employment as stipulated in your appointment letter or subsequent modifications thereof remain unchanged and will be governed by the company’s HR policies prevalent at the time.


Confidentiality


Please note that your compensation package is unique to you and not for comparison with other employees of the company. The matter of your compensation is confidential information of the company. Any discussion or disclosure of your compensation with anybody other than your departmental head or HR will be considered as breach of confidentiality by you.


We hope that you will continue to meet all challenges that we will offer you in the coming year and contribute substantially to the success of our organization as you have done in the past and fully justify the confidence placed in you by the management.


With best wishes,



${signatory}

${signatoryDesignation}
